name: global_settings
label: Global settings
inline_help_text: Set the global settings of the module here.

children.name: icons_width
children.label: Icons width
children.inline_help_text: Set the icons width here (Icons width are calculated in pixels).

children.name: icons_spacing
children.label: Icons spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the icons spacings here (Icons spacings are calculated in pixels).

children.name: icons_shape
children.label: Icons shape
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to add some corner radius to the icons.

children.name: border
children.label: Border
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to add a border on the outside of the accordion.

children.name: border_radius
children.label: Border radius
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to add some border radius.

children.name: border_color
children.label: Border color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the border color.

children.name: add_border_below_each_item
children.label: Add border below each item
children.inline_help_text: Set this option to true if you want to add a border below each item of the accordion.

children.name: make_first_item_open_by_default
children.label: Make first item open by default
children.inline_help_text: Set this option to true if you want to view the first accordion item opened by default.

children.name: items_top_spacing
children.label: Items top spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the items spacings here (Icons spacings are calculated in pixels).

children.name: items_bottom_spacing
children.label: Items bottom spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the items spacings here (Icons spacings are calculated in pixels).

children.name: items_left_spacing
children.label: Items left spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the items spacings here (Icons spacings are calculated in pixels).

children.name: items_right_spacing
children.label: Items right spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the items spacings here (Icons spacings are calculated in pixels).

children.name: items_border
children.label: Items border
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the border thickness below each accordion item.

children.name: titles_color
children.label: Titles color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the accordion items titles color.

children.name: background_color
children.label: Background color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the background color.

children.name: icon
children.label: Icon
children.inline_help_text: Set the icon settings here.

children.name: icon
children.label: Icon
children.inline_help_text: Select an icon to display here.

children.name: accessibility_options
children.label: Accessibility options
children.inline_help_text: Set accessibility options here.

children.name: purpose
children.label: Purpose
children.inline_help_text: Categorize the purpose of this icon for screen readers. Learn More

children.name: title
children.label: Description
children.inline_help_text: This text will be read by screen readers to describe the icon.

children.name: color
children.label: Color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the color.

children.name: hover_color
children.label: Hover color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the color.

children.name: background_color
children.label: Background color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the background color.

children.name: hover_background_color
children.label: Hover background color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the background color.

children.name: icon_active
children.label: Icon Active
children.inline_help_text: Set the icon settings here.

children.name: icon
children.label: Icon
children.inline_help_text: Select an icon to display here.

children.name: accessibility_options
children.label: Accessibility options
children.inline_help_text: Set accessibility options here.

children.name: purpose
children.label: Purpose
children.inline_help_text: Categorize the purpose of this icon for screen readers. Learn More

children.name: title
children.label: Description
children.inline_help_text: This text will be read by screen readers to describe the icon.

children.name: color
children.label: Color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the color.

children.name: hover_color
children.label: Hover color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the color.

children.name: background_color
children.label: Background color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the background color.

children.name: hover_background_color
children.label: Hover background color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the background color.

children.name: accordion_title
children.label: Title
children.inline_help_text: Set the accordion item title here (The title will always be visible).

children.name: accordion_text
children.label: Description
children.inline_help_text: Set the accordion item description here (The description will be visible on click).

children.name: accordion_image
children.label: Image
children.inline_help_text: Set the accordion item image here (Leave blank if you don't want to showcase anything).

children.name: accordion_image_format
children.label: Accordion image format
children.inline_help_text: Set the accordion item image format here.

children.name: button
children.label: Button
children.inline_help_text: Set the accordion item button here.

children.name: type
children.label: Button type
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the button type.

children.name: text
children.label: Text
children.inline_help_text: Set the button text here.

children.name: url
children.label: URL
children.inline_help_text: Set the button link here.

children.name: color
children.label: Color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the color.

children.name: hover_color
children.label: Hover color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the color on hover state.

children.name: background_color
children.label: Background color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the background color.

children.name: hover_background_color
children.label: Hover background color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the background color on hover state.

children.name: border_color
children.label: Border color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the border color.

children.name: hover_border_color
children.label: Hover border color
children.inline_help_text: Select one of the options to set the border color on hover state.

children.name: show_arrow
children.label: Show arrow
children.inline_help_text: Set this option to true if you would like to show an arrow in the button.

children.name: animation_delta
children.label: Animation delta
children.inline_help_text: Animation delta is an option helping you trigger the animation sooner or later that it would be originally.
